amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds for payment of salaries to recess appointees until such time as the appointee is formally confirmed by the Senate.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 76 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds to be used to pay the salary of individuals appointed to their current position through, or otherwise carry out, paragraphs (1), (2), and (3) of section 5503(a) of title 5, United States Code.
